actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the Secretary of Health and Human Services may extend up to 4 months the time to file reports of earnings by beneficiaries subject to the retirement test (in lieu of 3 months as provided under current law).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase to four months the extension of time allotted to Old Age and Survivors Insurance beneficiaries to file reports on outside earnings which exceed applicable limitations.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the Secretary of Health and Human Services may extend up to 4 months the time to file reports of earnings by beneficiaries subject to the retirement test (in lieu of 3 months as provided under current law).
